snippet: Rafael Nadal and Marc Lopez led Spain back into Davis Cup World Group after defeating the India pair of Leander Paes and Saketh Myneni 4-6, 7-6 (2), 6-4, 6-4 in the doubles on Saturday....
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal and Marc Lopez led Spain back into Davis Cup World Group after defeating the India pair of Leander Paes and Saketh Myneni 4-6, 7-6 (2), 6-4, 6-4 in the doubles on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Nadal & Lopez Lead Spain Back Into Davis Cup World Group
headline.main: Nadal & Lopez Lead Spain Back Into Davis Cup World Group
